text: Bog cheloveku, vo vnutrennost' yego, ne vlozhil dvukh serdets: On ne polozhil, chto by vashi suprugi, s kotorymi razvodites', nazvavshi ikh khrebtom materi, byli vam materyami; ne polozhil, chto by prinimayemyye vami v deti byli synami vashimi. Eto vashi slova v vashikh ustakh. Bog govorit istinu; On ukazyvayet pryamoy put'
